title: Repetative alerts
content: Firefox for Windows keeps sending me about unusual logins every time I login on the same device, how do I stop it???
creator: chasjan1

title: Firefox 122.0b9 stops responding when the file dialog is triggered
content: No crash report, no trace, no anything. I click "Save [insert] as...", and Firefox hangs and stops responding. Windows automatically shuts it off when clicking. Launching Firefox again sometimes says there was a problem reloading the session, but that's not guaranteed.
creator: leoholdiman7

title: manage app exceptions from specific www.ru? www.hk? www.eu? www.sa? www.us?com>? domain links
content: i have security set on strict and cannot figure out how to copy a domain link and paste it into exceptions for access to camera, mic, and audio input.output allowances. either the ui is confusing af or its a ghost exception and does not show the allowed specific domain
creator: v3n0mofgod47

title: sync deleted everything from firefox on computer
content: I thought that if I sync'd firefox on my computer with my new Samsung Tab A7 lite that everything from firefox on the computer including tabs, passwords etc would appear on both the computer and the tablet. Instead, it appears that I deleted everything from the computer, or perhaps moved everything from the computer to the tablet. I'm not sure. How can I tell if everything is on the tablet? Is it possible to move everything back from the tablet to the computer? If so, how? I'm not very computer literate. Guess that's obvious. I'm also older, 77, and visually challenged, so please be patient with me. I'm not even sure where to find this question and any answers people may suggest on this website, so perhaps you could drop me a hint by email at wdentry@yahoo.com? Thanks in advance. Bill
creator: wdentry
